title: All Project Details
creator: Apoorv Kansal

details: Developed both Front End and Back End of the website for IETE. A portal for registering Symposiums and uploading Research Papers to IETE Horizon
Equipped with powerful search option a user can also search papers among wide selection of Research Papers. The website is currently being tested in beta mode.
Developed a static website similar to Udemy for MOOC Courses. This project was assigned to me during taking PayPal's REST API Course.
Made 3 logins for admin, teachers and students. Used MongoDB as Database but also implemented the database from scratch using JSON files.
A simple webpage to run my TensorFlow model on the browser. The webpage is hosted using Github Pages. User can generate Friends Script on the web
I used TensorFlowJS to load the custom trained model on the website. Then user can enter the first sentence and then model will generate script.
First "complete" website made by me. This website was made after completion of my Web Developer Bootcamp by Colt Steele.
Simple Static website with MongoDB as database. Has features like saving user data, admin controls etc. UI was highly inspired from Netflix
I nicknamed my personal website "The Website". This website was built using React and Firebase for hosting.
There are some easter eggs hidden in the website and I plan to expand functionality of this website. Check Github Readme for more.
I decided to make a website for my house expenses. After finding out all the things required, quickly made a static website to store all types of household expenses
User can add multiple houses, add credit cards, etc. Monthly expense reports were generated and even graphs were made.

data.tooltip: Due to security reasons, Github Repo is Private.

details: Specifically designed for VITians at Chennai Campus. This is one of my dream projects I wanted to do from my 1st year and I finally got chance to do in 3rd year.
A complete suite of Apps and Websites for Students of VIT Chennai to check attendance and assignments in one place. Got more than 250 downloads in just 2 days of beta launch.
One more App  dedicated to VITians, this app is also a part of my project "Hello Doctor" in which students can get prescription from doctors without leaving the hostel.

This App was designed just before COVID-19 and fortunately could help in future as many simple diseases can be cured by just talking to Doctor and getting prescriptions. This limits physical interaction.
This is the "First" App made using React Native and Firebase. The concept is simple and so is the UI.
It is a simple anonymous chatting App, anyone can create a Room and you are get to go. Rooms can be password protected. It is just another messaging app with anonymity.
